getRandom
=============

getRandom value from a matrix (Array, ArrayLike, String)

## Requires

- [Number.random](../Number.random)

## getRandom(matrix, fallback)

Returns a random value in matrix

```javascript
getRandom(['a', 'b', 'c']);
// can be 'a', 'b' or 'c'
getRandom('hello');
// can be 'h','e','l','l' or 'o'
```
